title.rendered: MSU COM College of Osteopathic Medicine Application Form

content.rendered:
MSU COM College of Osteopathic Medicine – MSU COM Admissions, MSU COM Average MCAT And GPA, MSU COM Match List, Michigan State University College of Osteopathic Medicine Requirements

Contents on This Page

Toggle
  • How to Apply to MSU COM Osteopathic Medicine
  • Applying to MSU COM College of Osteopathic Medicine Application Form – Requirements and Guides

This is to inform the general public and prospective students of Osteopathic Medicine that the Michigan State University College of Osteopathic Medicine MSU COM application portal 2024 is currently open until December 1, 2024.

Interested applicants are hereby advised to visit the AACOMAS application portal to apply for admission. The college process an early admission cycle.

Sometimes you may be worrying about how to gain admission to MSU COM, or how to apply to MSU COM Osteopathic Medicine. Read through these documents for a better understanding.

How to Apply to MSU COM Osteopathic Medicine

Applying to MSU COM Osteopathic Medicine is done through the AACOMAS Application Service portal. Prospective students of MSU COM Osteopathic Medicine should note that Admission is complete when you follow the steps below;

  • Submit Primary Application through the AACOMAS Application Portal
  • The secondary Application is reviewed by MSU COM when the Application fee is paid.
  • Interview
  • Admission Offers
  • Fees Deposit
  • Course Enrolment

To learn about the AACOMAS Application, kindly click here

Applying to MSU COM College of Osteopathic Medicine Application Form – Requirements and Guides

Applying to the MSU COM Osteopathic Medical College 2024 is highly competitive and required good grade points and proper document submission to meet the competitive admission criteria.

To browse the MSU COM Admission Requirement, Click here

How to Apply for MSU COM Osteopathic Medical Schools

The application for admission into various medical colleges is done through the American Association of Colleges of Osteopathic Medicine Application Service (AACOMAS) portal. The AACOMAS is the centralized application service for U.S. osteopathic medical schools.

To apply,

  • Visit https://aacomas.liaisoncas.com.
  • Login with your Username and password.
  • Fill and submit all required forms online.
  • Pay all application fees
  • Submit all academic documents
  • Submit a letter of Recommendation
  • Submit personal statement

When Is It Too Late to Apply to MSU COM Osteopathic Medicine

December 1, 2024, is the Deadline to apply for MSU COM Osteopathic Medicine. Application deadline for different medical colleges differs. Ensure to visit the desired colleges to find an appropriate deadline before applying.
